article_title: Trade Names: Lawn care firm focused on localized service
article_text:
What is it?: Provides lawn care fertilization and weed control applications for residential and commercial turf, sports fields and industrial applications.

Location: 7421 Ranco Road in Henrico County; additional offices in Williamsburg and Charlottesville

Employees: 82 (74 of which are in Richmond), including the owner

Owner: Gil Grattan

Contact: (804) 285-6200 or www.virginiagreenlawncare.com

og.description: Gil Grattan is taking lawn care to a new level of service.
